summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ZWAP! Coin cryptocurrency app with Z Points system and tiered subscriptions. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend loads correctly but has wallet connection persistence issues.

integration_issues.issue: After wallet connection, app briefly shows dashboard/move tab but then returns to welcome screen
integration_issues.note: Wallet connection modal works, but connection doesn't persist properly

passed_tests: Welcome screen displays correctly with ZWAP! logo and 3 action buttons (Swap, Earn, Shop)
Wallet connection modal opens with MetaMask and Trust Wallet options
All backend APIs working perfectly (20/20 tests passed)
User creation with tier=starter, zwap=100, zpts=0 working correctly
Game result submission (zBrickles, zTrivia) awards both ZWAP and Z Points
Trivia questions API returns 5 questions with crypto knowledge
Tier configuration API returns starter and plus tiers with correct games and caps
Shop items API returns 7 items with dual pricing (ZWAP and Z Points)
Crypto prices API working with live data from CoinGecko
Step rewards calculation working with tiered system
Z Points daily cap system working (20 for starter, 30 for plus)
Swap execution working with proper fee calculation
Error handling working correctly (404 for non-existent users, 400 for insufficient balance)
zWALK interface briefly visible showing step counter and tiered earning
Purchase validation working (insufficient balance errors as expected)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix wallet connection persistence issue - wallet connects successfully but doesn't maintain session, causing app to return to welcome screen
